Syntax.js - Basic

                            
This is a basic example of how to use Syntax.js to highlight code inside a DOM element.

                            
                        

                    
                        

                            div.syntax-highlight div.code {
                                background-color: var(--container-background-color-container);
                                border-radius: var(--border-radius);
                                padding: 15px;
                                overflow-x: auto;
                                overflow-y: hidden;
                                position: relative;
                                border: var(--border-size) solid var(--container-border-color-container);
                                color: var(--color-black);
                              }
